Posts.Content:
I'm new here I just got a call back. I had a mammogram Monday got a call that
evening, they got me in tomorrow on Wednesday. going to do a retest and then
if needed an ultrasound. I have an annual mammogram was a year ago and they
saw some changes they said in my left breast.
I will be 70, no breast cancer history, I used to have fibrocystic breasts, my doc
told me to quit drinking coffee and reduce caffeine and that stopped the pain. I
also had lost 50 pounds years ago I have regained 10 but I'm still in pretty good
condition. I had a hysterectomy almost 20 years ago and still take premarin, that
may have to stop, we shall see. Hate to it keeps me young, but oh well.
I have never had a recall before so I'm nervous, but they are doing it quickly, the
tech said she notified my doctor and that they will make sure I know if anything
is wrong before I leave so that's not going to leave me hanging like so many of 
you have been. I think I have a good facility and also a good doc, hoping for
the best and no matter what I will work through it. I have been under so much
stress the last year or two nothing would surprise me. A mentally challenged 
daughter of 44 to deal with and a MIL with dementia/alzheimers, they are both 
placed now so I' hoping to be able to distress. Will get my answers tomorrow.
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared
